entry.title: House central 2 bedrooms Vale da Telha Aljezur - garden, fireplace (Provenda)
entry.content:
€ 245.000
House central 2 bedrooms Vale da Telha Aljezur - garden, fireplace
prev
next
Sold
168m²  1.260m²REF PV-M-551

Sale
One-storey villa, located in the central area of ​​the Urbanização do Vale da Telha, within walking distance of Restaurants and Supermarket; Comprising 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen and living room with fireplace and mezzanine. Water, Light and Large Garden A 5-minute drive from the beaches of Arrifana and Monte Clérigo. Lagos is just 20 minutes away and Faro Airport is approx. 90 minutes.
Add to Favorites
Schedule a Visit More information

entry.title: Farm 2 bedrooms Brejo da Moita Rogil Aljezur - water, sea view, sea view, electricity (Provenda)
entry.content:
€ 750.000
Farm 2 bedrooms Brejo da Moita Rogil Aljezur - water, sea view, sea view, electricity
prev
next
146m²  75.240m²REF PV-T-550

Sale
Property located in a prime area of ​​the Costa Vicentina, with privileged Sea views. Highlighting the wide variety of existing Vegetation - A unique environment and excellent sun exposure. It is supplied with water from the Irrigation Channel and the Public network. Electricity is from the public grid.

entry.title: Farm 3 bedrooms Cercado Aljezur - fruit trees, garage, garden (Provenda)
entry.content:
€ 580.000
Farm 3 bedrooms Cercado Aljezur - fruit trees, garage, garden
prev
next
Sold
232m²  29.250m²REF PV-M-548

Sale
Charming property located in a quiet and green area. With a ready-to-live-in house of 162sqm, consisting of 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 1 kitchen, pantry, common room and garage. This can be extended up to 300sqm. Next to the house there is a lake, in harmony with the surroundings. The property has a wide variety of fruit trees, vineyards, garden and is supported by a building of 70sqm.

prev
next
340m²  73.720m²REF PV-T-546

entry.content:
€ 310.000

prev
next
Sold
370,06m²  15.100m²REF PV-T-543

Sale
Property with fabulous views over Aljezur. Located 700 meters from the village, with an area of 15.100sqm, covered area of 370.06sqm, consisting of a dwelling and warehouses, two of which are separate from the main house. Supplied with electricity and water from the public network, the existing tank is used for watering the garden, vegetable garden, fruit trees and seasonal crops. Great Investment!

prev
next
Sold
62m²  62.750m²REF PV-T-544

Sale
Beautiful property with 62.750sqm, comprising a forest area with pine trees, cork oaks and arbutus trees. In this property there is a house in ruins with 62sqm with the possibility of expansion up to 300sqm. Easy access, about 5 km from Praia da Amoreira and less than 1 km from Aljezur. Public Water and Electricity.

entry.title: House/Villa 3+1 bedrooms Marmelete Monchique (Provenda)
entry.content:
€ 318.500
House/Villa 3+1 bedrooms Marmelete Monchique
prev
next
Reserved
136m²  308,70m²REF PV-M-545

Sale
Picturesque building renovated in 2020. Renovation included structure and new roof. The building is divided into 3 fractions (Studio, T1 and T2) Very versatile space, which allows immediate profitability of the space. The renovation was carried out respecting the environment and using natural materials You will immediately feel at home, with the colors, textures and good vibe. Charming place where you can live with your family and friends 15 minutes from Aljezur and only 20 minutes from the main beaches

prev
next
357m²  154.920m²REF PV-T-540

Sale
Excellent property with 15,492 HA, with 2 old buildings with a total area of 357sqm. Located in the Natural Park of Costa Vicentina, close to the coastal zone. With good access, quiet area, surrounded by a beautiful landscape and with great solar orientation. Possibility of expansion of the construction area, up to 500sqm. Supplied with water through the irrigation canal and electricity from the public network.
